Translations.Text: Woh kehney lagay kay mein ney tum say nahi kaha tha kay tum meray humraah reh ker hergiz sabar nahi ker saktay

Musa (alh-e-salam) ney jawab diya agar abb iss kay baad mein aap say kissi cheez kay baray mein sawal keroon to be-shak aap mujhay apney sath na rakhna yaqeena aap meri taraf say (hadd) uzur ko phonch chukay

Phir dono chalay aik gaaon walon kay pass aaker unn say khana talab kiya to unhon ney unn ki mehmandaari say saaf inkar ker diya dono ney wahan aik deewar paee jo gira hi chahati thi uss ney ussay theek aur durust ker diya musa (alh-e-salam) kehney lagay agar aap chahatay to iss per ujrat ley letay
Uss ney kaha bus yeh judaee hai meray aur teray darmiyan abb mein tujhay inn baton ki asliyat bhi bata doon ga jiss per tujh say sabar na ho saka

Kashti to chand miskeeno ki thi jo daya mein kaam kaaj kertay thay. Mein ney uss mein kuch tor phor kerney ka irada ker liya kiyon kay unn kay aagay aik badshah tha jo her aik (sahih saalim) kashti ko jabran zabt ler leta tha
Aur uss larkay kay maa baap eman walay thay. Humen khof hua kay kahin yeh unhen apni sirkashi aur kufur say aajiz-o-pareshan na kerdey
Iss liye hum ney chaha kay unhen unn ka perwerdigar iss kay badlay iss say behtar pakeezgi wala aur iss say ziyada mohabbat aur piyar wala bacha inayat farmaye

Deewar ka qissa yeh hai kay iss shehar mein do yateem bachay hain jin ka khazana inn ki iss deewar kay neechay dafan hai inn ka baap bara nek shaks tha to teray rab ki chahat thi kay yeh dono yateem apni jawani ki umar mein aaker apna yeh khazana teray rab ki meharbani aur rehmat say nikal len mein ney apni raye say koi kaam nahi kiya yeh thi asal haqeeqat unn waqiyaat ki jin per aap say sabar na hosaka
Aap say zulqarnain ka waqiya yeh log daryaft ker rahey hain aap keh dijiye kay mein unn ka thora sa haal tumhen parh ker sunata hun
Hum ney ussay zamin mein qooat ata farmaee thi aur ussay her cheez kay saman bhi inayat ker diye thay
Woh aik raah kay peechay laga

Yahan tak kay sooraj doobney ki jagah phonch gaya aur ussay aik daldal kay chashmay mein ghuroob hota hua paya aur iss chashmay kay pass aik qom ko bhi paya hum ney farma diya kay aey zulqarnain! Ya to tu enhen takleef phonchaye ya inn kay baray mein tu koi behtareen ravish ikhtiyar keray
Uss ney kaha jo zulm keray ga ussay to hum bhi abb saza den gay phir woh apney perwerdigar ki taraf lotaya jayega aur woh ussay sakht tar azab dey ga
Haan jo eman laye aur nek aemaal keray uss kay liye to badlay mein bhalaee hai aur hum ussay apney kaam mein bhi aasani hi ka hukum den gay
Phir woh aur raah kay peechay laga
Yahan tak kay jab sooraj nikalney ki jagah tak phoncha to ussay aik aisi qom per nikalta hua paya kay unn kay liye hum ney uss say aur koi oat nahi banaee
Waqiya aisa hi hai aur hum ney uss kay pass ki kul khabron ka ehaata ker rakha hai
Woh phir aik safar kay saman mein laga
Yahan tak kay jab do deewaron kay darmiyan phoncha unn dono kay paray uss ney aik aisi qom paee jo baat samjhney ka qareeb bhi na thi

Unhon ney kaha aey zulqarnain! Yajoob majooj iss mulk mein (baray bhari) fasadi hain to kiya hum aap kay liye kuch kharch ka intizam ker den? (iss shart per kay) aap humaray aur unn kay darmiyan aik deewat bana den
Uss ney jawab diya kay meray ikhtiyar mein meray perwerdigar ney jo dey rakha hai wohi behtar hai tum sirf qooat taqat say meri madad kero

Mein tum mein aur inn mein mazboot hijab bana deta hun. Mujhay lohay ki chadaren laa do. Yahan tak kay jab inn dono paharon kay darmiyan deewar barabar kerdi to hukum diya kay aag tez jalao ta-waqt-e-kay lohay ki inn chadaron ko bilkul aag ker diyato farmaya meray pass laao iss per pighla hua tanbaa daal doon
Pus to inn mein iss deewar kay upper charhney ki taqat thi aur na iss mein koi soorakh ker saktay thay
Kaha yeh sab meray rab ki meharbani hai haan jab meray rab ka wada aayega to issay zamin boss ker dey ga be-shak meray rab ka wada sacha aur haq hai
